description: 2 standing women woman at L wearing dress, barefoot, with head outside picture; woman at R wearing thongs, jeans and a tank top, holding a cigarette; girl running in background behind women; boy crawling at L in foreground; on a beach; matted
markings: \'C1981 Joan Moss/c1981 Joan Moss \'Mother & Child\' [illegible] Wilmette-kids helter skelter [illegible] open #2 Natasha Series\' and \'18\', in pencil, on back; \'M-29-7/81-16\', in black ink, LRC, on back
title: Mothers and Their Children, Kids Helter Skelter, Wilmette, Illinois
